name: Urban Cement Outdoor
description: Designed for patios and terraces, this matte tile offers a raw cement aesthetic with anti-slip finish.

name: Rustic Mountain Slate
description: A strong slate tile perfect for garden paths, verandas, and driveways with a natural textured surface.

name: Beige Stone Marble
description: With natural stone elegance, this tile suits outdoor lounges and verandas looking for a refined touch.

name: Outdoor Wood Plank
description: Oak-inspired tile designed for exterior flooring such as decks and patios with slip-resistant finish.

name: Ivory Shine Outdoor
description: A glossy vitrified tile ideal for shaded outdoor areas like covered balconies or gazebos.

name: Desert Sand Outdoor
description: Matte-finished tile suited for walkways and garden surroundings with a desert-inspired tone.

name: Pebble Stone Feel
shortDescription: Textured tile for wet outdoor zones.
description: Mimicking river pebbles, this tile is ideal for outdoor showers, balconies, and garden borders.

name: Black Onyx Outdoor
description: Glossy black tile great for bold patio or outdoor kitchen accents with weather-resistant surface.

name: Carrara Marble Stone
description: Embrace classic marble looks even outside – suitable for verandas and garden sitting areas.

name: Ashwood Exterior Tile
description: Ash brown plank-look tile suited for backyard decks, pergolas, and terraces.

name: Icy Blue Garden Tile
description: Frosty tones for spa zones, outdoor lounges, or calming garden nooks with water-resistance.

name: Terracotta Rustic Outdoor
description: Timeless terracotta style suited for patios, porches, and garden walls with rustic charm.

name: Graphite Outdoor Slate
description: Graphite-toned tile with stone texture, excellent for walkways and contemporary exterior designs.

name: Cream Vitrified Outdoors
description: Almond cream vitrified tile perfect for covered verandas or sit-outs, offering both style and durability.

name: Grey Line Textured Tile
description: Elegant linear texture for patios and entryways – slip-resistant and weather-ready.
